## Phase Overview

This issue tracks Phase 2 of the VR4DEAF repository migration plan: identifying and properly archiving obsolete or redundant repositories.

**Related Documentation**: `MIGRATION_PLAN.md`, `docs/migration/deprecated-repositories.md`

## Objectives

- [ ] Review Phase 1 audit findings
- [ ] Identify repositories for archiving
- [ ] Create migration notices
- [ ] Archive deprecated repositories
- [ ] Document all archived repositories

## Tasks

### Review and Identification
- [ ] Review audit findings with stakeholders
- [ ] Identify unused prototype code
- [ ] Identify superseded implementations
- [ ] Identify experimental branches
- [ ] Identify legacy codebases
- [ ] Get stakeholder approval for archive list

### Migration Notices
- [ ] Create deprecation README template
- [ ] Add README notices to deprecated repos
- [ ] Update GitHub repository descriptions
- [ ] Add deprecation tags to repos
- [ ] Document new locations for active features

### Archiving Process
- [ ] Archive repositories on GitHub
- [ ] Update organization repository lists
- [ ] Create redirect documentation
- [ ] Notify affected users/teams

## Deliverables

- [ ] `docs/migration/deprecated-repositories.md` completed
- [ ] Archive notices in all deprecated repositories
- [ ] Updated organization repository lists
- [ ] Communication sent to affected users

## Timeline

- **Start Date**: [DATE]
- **Target Completion**: 1 week from start
- **Status**: ðŸ”„ Not Started / ðŸ”„ In Progress / âœ… Complete

## Success Criteria

- All obsolete repositories properly archived
- Clear migration paths documented for any active users
- No confusion about which repositories are actively maintained
- Stakeholder approval received
